column5: I am heading up to Separation this Saturday and was wondering if anyone had any recent reports from the area? I appreciate any information that comes my way. Fish24/7

Greetings fish, Rich here from, Glenwood Illinois ,will be up at the campground saturday ,site5.Group that I work with is at the camground this week,they will be back thursday night,so I will attempt to have an accurate up to date report.My email address is [email protected] to see you saturday. Rich
Have you or anyone else received any info. on this area yet? Leaving tomorrow...won't be able to sleep tonight. fish24/7
